channel.title: Comments on: Five Classic Gaming Pranks

item.title: By: Eon Blue
item.dc:creator: Eon Blue
item.description:
My favorite prank of all time was back in the first few months of EQ release. I was playing a necromancer and when you got up to a certain level you could cast a spell on your pet to be able to talk through him. Kind of useless until I found out that it could also be used on NPCs!
I spent many hours in Freeport using my new found skill. I'd cast on the npc then invis myself and wait for a noob to come along. I'd then give him a mighty quest to travel across the continent and talk to soandso. The best was when they'd start shouting to form a group for a 'GM Quest' and go on their merry way to fame and fortune. It was cruel, but oh so fun. The bug was fixed in the next patch and the game went downhill from there.
item.content:encoded:
My favorite prank of all time was back in the first few months of EQ release. I was playing a necromancer and when you got up to a certain level you could cast a spell on your pet to be able to talk through him. Kind of useless until I found out that it could also be used on NPCs!

I spent many hours in Freeport using my new found skill. I’d cast on the npc then invis myself and wait for a noob to come along. I’d then give him a mighty quest to travel across the continent and talk to soandso. The best was when they’d start shouting to form a group for a ‘GM Quest’ and go on their merry way to fame and fortune. It was cruel, but oh so fun. The bug was fixed in the next patch and the game went downhill from there.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: My favorite in wow is to occasionally ask "How do quit my guild?" - people that reply with /gquit drop from their guild. I've been yelled at many times for asking that.
item.content:encoded: My favorite in wow is to occasionally ask “How do quit my guild?” – people that reply with /gquit drop from their guild. I’ve been yelled at many times for asking that.

item.title: By: romp
item.dc:creator: romp
item.description:
I combined the Fake Mistell and the Guild Chat Chicanery ones the other night, it went something like this (my main is a Dwarf Paladin):
/g Hey Baby, I may be short, but I am long where it counts! ;) /g ooops sry mistell :)
pause ....
replies: Guildie 1: ? Guildie 2: ?confused? M, what r u doing? Guildie 3: M, are you giving the Guild a bad name?
lolmao, Thanks Foton!
item.content:encoded:
I combined the Fake Mistell and the Guild Chat Chicanery ones the other night, it went something like this (my main is a Dwarf Paladin):

/g Hey Baby, I may be short, but I am long where it counts! ðŸ˜‰
/g ooops sry mistell ðŸ™‚

pause ….

replies:
Guildie 1: ?
Guildie 2: ?confused? M, what r u doing?
Guildie 3: M, are you giving the Guild a bad name?

lolmao, Thanks Foton!

item.title: By: Jaundice
item.dc:creator: Jaundice
item.description: A personal favourite is to put up a portal to Darnassus and as you're casting call 'Summoning , please click portal!'
item.content:encoded: A personal favourite is to put up a portal to Darnassus and as you’re casting call ‘Summoning , please click portal!’

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Damn. I forgot one of my favorite pranks of all time: the unintentional /quit.
Then there's the intentional /q to fake an LD because you're ducking a group or a raid, but that's not a prank, rather self preservation.
item.content:encoded:
Damn. I forgot one of my favorite pranks of all time: the unintentional /quit.

Then there’s the intentional /q to fake an LD because you’re ducking a group or a raid, but that’s not a prank, rather self preservation.

item.title: By: Metahari
item.dc:creator: Metahari
item.content:encoded:
The “press alt-f4” style of joke is as old as online communication. I remember one multi line chat BBS back in the ’80s where the joke went like this:

Newb: “How do I access the online games section?”

Bastard: “/z online games”

/z was of course the command that disconnected you from the BBS.

Mages aren’t the only ones who can have fun. The old priest mind control and run your buddy off the cliff is good fun.

item.title: By: Factory
item.dc:creator: Factory
item.description:
Surely there must be the equivilant of (in IRC): Bob> Hey, how do I make multicoloured text in MiRC??? Evil> Press Alt-F4.
?
item.content:encoded:
Surely there must be the equivilant of (in IRC):
Bob> Hey, how do I make multicoloured text in MiRC???
Evil> Press Alt-F4.

?

item.title: By: Chef
item.dc:creator: Chef
item.description: I do the portal to Darn thing all the time. Another fun thing to do is to put the portal in the middle of Domos fire pit or in the area next to Onyxia
item.content:encoded: I do the portal to Darn thing all the time. Another fun thing to do is to put the portal in the middle of Domos fire pit or in the area next to Onyxia
